effect.red_blue: Raises user’s Defense by one stage. After this move is used, the power of ice ball and rollout are doubled until the user leaves the field.

effect.blue_japan: Raises user’s Defense by one stage. After this move is used, the power of ice ball and rollout are doubled until the user leaves the field.
